long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT: This extension works with AllWebID Identity Manager for Windows. It is required only for the users who have installed AllWebID Identity Manager for secure login to websites requiring 2-factor authentication.
 
AllWebID Identity Manager is a scalable and secure online 2-factor identity authentication solution that can be easily integrated with the login workflows for any enterprise web portal and SaaS application. It verifies the identity of the person who is submitting the password before providing access to critical business data. 

With AllWebID Identity Manager, stolen passwords can no longer be used for unauthorized access to your website. AllWebID offers multiple options for user identity authentication. When users provide their passwords to log into your web applications, you can verify identities either by matching a one-time use pin code texted to their cell phones or by matching their fingerprint templates in real time. 

Quick to implement, convenient to use, secure and cost effective!

Secure your website logins within minutes. Try it for free. Sign up for AllWebID Identity Manager at https://allwebid.com/FreeTrial.aspx
